summary: Lara Croft like character ready to begin the Dragonborn story!
descriptionHtml:
Yes, i've played a lot with sliders today and i made a character barely similar to Lara Croft (Tomb Raider). I mean, the real Lara Croft, Angelina Jolie, not that crying stupid girl from the Square Enix videogame...

Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?]Better females by bella[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] + [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/?]CharGen Extension[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
If you want to have the videogame ponytail (Tomb Raider 2013) use this mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47000/?]Skyrim Hair Physics Project[/url]

Optional (screenshots are made with that)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP female body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP[/url]
Installation:
Copy the .ess file into your savegame folder (Documents/My Games/Skyrim/saves)

Enjoy

IMPORTANT ADVICE:
YOU CAN SIMPLY DOWNLOAD THIS SAVEGAME AND SAVE THE FACE MORPHS WITH RACE MENU F9 OPTION, DOING THIS YOU'LL BE ABLE TO IMPORT THIS FACE MESH INTO YOUR CURRENT PLAYING CHARACTER, THEN YOU CAN DELETE THIS SAVEGAME WITHOUT ANY PROBLEMS!

IMAGES ADDED AND FILE UPDATED!
author: Quadrefoil
